data.text: @CartlandDavid @ADFOWL So the unvaccinated stays alive but vaccinate died
@CartlandDavid Did you ever pass any medical qualifications? Seem to know nothing about all cause mottality and age differentials

@BobsSkull @GrumpyOW @CartlandDavid Er no

The categories of the 'unvaccinated' also include people who have just been vaccinated

For up to 28 days in fact

Which is often when people get ill -and sometimes sadly die

Like this chap, apparently an 'antivax unvaccinated person' who funnily enough died after vaccine https://t.co/ZhIVZsRULl

@GrumpyOW @CartlandDavid Wrong again Sidsy

The categories of the 'unvaccinated' include people who have just been vaccinated

For up to 28 days in fact

Which is often when people get ill -and sometimes sadly die

@CartlandDavid I think you'll still find some protective effect of the vaccine if you age-stratify that data (because old ppl are modestly more jabbed but much more susceptible). But it's getting to the stage now where it's not a material real-risk protection for anyone under 60.

@CartlandDavid I asked questions about this from the start........I even raised in an RCN forum, along with questions posed by Peter Doshi. 

I was called an antivaxxer and banned.
@GrumpyOW @CartlandDavid Let’s face it.  You are arguing a lost cause.
@CartlandDavid @orgogg Here’s a pretty diagram to show a similar explanation for hospitalisations. https://t.co/5e9ZSRZ3sg
